EVENT PLANNING AT ITS FINEST

Tell Me More
DJ/MC Service

With over 25 years of experience, Cre8tiveLA will take your party to the next level whether it's a Wedding, Quinceañera, Corporate Event, or Private Party!

Event Planning

Event planning has never been easier. Let Cre8tiveLA book all your vendors, coordinate the timeline, and run your event!

Custom Lighting

Transform your ordinary banquet hall into the space of your dreams with custom lighting options to create a cool vibe.

Why Cre8tiveLA?

• Cre8tiveLA offers top-notch DJ services, MCs, and event planning with over 20 years of industry experience. We take pride in providing the finest event services thanks to our loyal clientele. Our extensive collection of high-end equipment, including wireless uplights, wedding monograms, and textured lighting, ensures your event is nothing short of exceptional.

• All of our vendors are top-notch, and we only work with vendors that meet the highest quality in their industry. Due to the high referral rate from our clientele, we decided it was time to join the online media world, this will give potential clients the opportunity to see the quality of our work.

• Cre8tiveLA, based in the City of Lomita, offers free consultations by appointment at our central office. For any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. Rest assured, with over two decades of experience, our track record speaks for itself.

Thank you for your time.

- Ricardo Velasquez -
DJ/MC/Event Planner
Since 1993

Timeline

our story

  • 1988-1996

    Our Humble Beginnings

    DJ Ricardo V started DJing at the age of 13 in the South Bay. Back then it was strictly vinyl Records. It wasn’t easy finding records in my neighborhood.

  • 1996-2008

    WP Records

    At the age of 21, I established my own personal DJ shop in the city of Lomita. This marked the birth of WP Records, a hub catering to all DJ needs, which operated until 2008.

  • 2008

    Event Planning

    As time changed, so did the business. It eventually transitioned into an events company. Knowing and working with so many vendors in our industry allowed us to serve our clients better as we could offer them many services under one roof.

  • 2023

    Cre8tive Wedding and Events

    Fast forward to 2023, we’ve been in the industry for over 25 years, specializing in DJs, MCs, and Wedding Planning. Now known as Cre8tive Weddings and Events, or Cre8tiveLA.com, your go-to for all event-related needs.

  • Be Part
    of Our
    Story!
